channel.description: Recent content in Dwm on Barim's blog · ابراهيم

item.title: Disable tabs in Firefox
item.description: If you use a tiled window manager like me, Suckless DWM for example, and have Firefox as your browser, you may be interested by not showing the tabs.

item.title: usb mount and policykit
item.description: DWM is my tiled window manager. It’s fast, flexible and fun. My linux desktop is up and running after a few seconds… (ok, thanks also to the ssd :-) ).
